entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this morning. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
